channel.title: Voting system PLZ HELP
channel.description:
how do i make it to were when one of my players vote for me i give them an amount of cash? IDK if anyone ever played this but corruption remix.com b4 it got shut down. kinda like there deal what u had to do is empty ur inventory like put all ur items in the bank. and then vote. Then when you logged in you got 300m. how do i make to were the very same thing would happen but change the amount of cash given.?
Crisisx does a very simmalar thing to this. how can i do it?

item.title: Voting system PLZ HELP
